title: Repeat experiment with double initial speed

content.question: The student repeats the whole experiment but doubles the initial speed <math alttext="v sub i" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mi>i</mi></msub></math> of the cart with mass <math alttext="m sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> for each data point collected. When the new data points are plotted and a best-fit line is drawn, how would the slope of this best-fit line compare to the slope on the original graph?

choices.label: The slope would stay the same.
The slope would be one-half as great.
The slope would be one-quarter as great.
The slope would be twice as great.
The slope would be four times as great.

content.answer: The slope would stay the same.
